body:
HackerRank for Work allows you to create new questions as per your requirements. Below are the various methods available to create questions in HackerRank for work. 

Methods to Create Questions

You can use the following methods to create a new question:

If you want to... Then...
Create a new question in the Library

Click on the Library tab on the home page and click Create Question.
Create a new question for a new Test 

i. Click on the Tests tab on the home page and click Create Test.

ii. In the Questions tab of the Test, click Add from Library or click the plus sign and select Create Question.
Create a new Question for an existing Test

i. Click on the Tests tab on the home page and then click the required Test name, search for the required test and click on it.

ii. In the Questions tab of the Test, click on the plus sign and select Create Question.

Note: Irrespective of how to create a new question, all these questions are available in your personal library.

For the detailed steps to create a question, refer to the specific question-type topics: 

Create a Coding Question Create a Database Engineer Question Create a HTML/CSS/JavaScript Question
Create a DevOps Question Create an Approximate Solution Create a Subjective Question
Create a Sentence Completion Question Create a Diagram Question Create a Project-based Question
Create a Multiple Choice Question Create a File Upload Question

Create a Data Science Question
title: Creating Questions
